Pre-Game Insights: Hungary are undefeated in all four of their previous matchups against Bosnia and Herzegovina

Bosnia have lost their last seven games on the bounce and 12 of their last 15 across all competitions
Others: Hungary were ranked 31st in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 44 places above their midweek opponents
